format:

name: Table Styling
format:
<style>
.semester-courses-table .md-table {
    width: 100% !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table td {
    white-space: normal !important;
    word-wrap: break-word !important;
    vertical-align: top !important;
    padding: 8px 12px !important;
    line-height: 1.4 !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table th {
    background-color: #0094CE !important;
    color: white !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    padding: 10px 12px !important;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #007bb5 !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table tr:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #f8f9fa !important;
}

.semester-courses-table .md-table tr:hover {
    background-color: #e8f4fd !important;
}

/* Course names column specific styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:last-child {
    font-size: 13px !important;
    max-width: 400px !important;
}

/* University column styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:nth-child(3) {
    font-weight: 500 !important;
    color: #0c5460 !important;
}

/* Semester column styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:first-child {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    background-color: #e8f4fd !important;
    color: #0c5460 !important;
}

/* Count column styling */
.semester-courses-table .md-table td:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    color: #28a745 !important;
    font-size: 14px !important;
}
</style>
